Line.MultilineString: The best way to try out new armour is in combat. The blacksmith is offering one of his latest creations to anyone who volunteers. You show up and are handed a piece of gear and told to take on the 3 burly men standing in the courtyard. En Garde.
You get thoroughly beaten up and the blacksmith retrieves his item, grumbling about needing to make adjustments.
The gear works great, and you soundly thrash your opponents. The blacksmith lets you keep the item, thanking for for trying it out.
